Hmm, I guess everything is fine, I mean yeah it's pretty dark all the assimilation thing but slime-chan always leave exact copies of every girl to leave her life so... everything seems fine to me xd this man haves an endless harem tho

@b80047 Slime chans definitely playing coy. She says he never asked but he did but I guess its a matter of her interpretation of her being them once consumed. Though there's no mistaking that she does consider them to die in the act as the side comic vol 4 showcased. She just seems to consider the act not different than the act throwing away a banana peel after eating it. Its only manners to do so.

MC: do you eat humans?
Slime: no i assimilate
MC: but the others vanish right?
Slime: no i retain their memories, shape and personalities
MC: but they will be considered "missing" right?
Slime: i can split and mimic the girls so they are still here
Me: YOU'RE EATING PEOPLE, YOU JELLO SMARTASS!! STOP SUGAR-COATING IT! JUST PUT THE CHERRY ON TOP AND GIVE ME MY CHEESECAKE! I DONT WANT NO FROSTING, NO WHIPCREAM, NO CHOCOLATE SYRUP AND DONT YOU DARE ADD COCONUT FLAKES! JUST THE CAKE AND CHERRY, THATS IT! *deeply inhales*

*exhales*

Rememeber, this is made by DATE. I you know anything about DATE then you'd know that there are no happy endings.
It seems that the slime was able to replicate people without even "assimilating" them. She could become them before she fully consumed them, so therefore I'd tell her to copy not kill and replace
I would say, though, that this is one of the best Slime concepts I've ever seen, and the story is about on par with Deep Stalker.

"The slime-chan would do everything for him." I'm not so sure about that. Do not confuse the intentions of a Yandere... especially knowing DATE. At least according to the translation, the creature has hidden the truth from Yuuji with lies by omission. It's true that she fesses up to a lot up to this point, but I don't think we know her true intentions still.
